story_08_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I’ve heard there’s quite a skilled Trainer
somewhere around this glacier.
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: But I don’t know exactly where...
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I wonder where they are... 
It’s pretty cold out here.
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What are you talking about?!
You get cold too easily, Flannery!
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
My hometown is hot, and I didn’t think to pack
anything besides the clothes I normally wear.
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I guess I would be pretty cold if I were out here
dressed like that. Wanna borrow my scarf?
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0700_10: I-I’m OK. Th-thanks for the c-c-concern, though.
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
It’ll be even colder once the sun goes down.
There will be time for chitchat later.
We need to focus on our search for now.
story_08_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
All right, let’s hurry up and get this done before
Flannery catches a cold!
